column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I was leaning towards another subject for review #500
column2: but after a weekend visit here
column3: I realized that there was no better choice.  Simply put
column4: the Art Institute is Chicago's greatest tangible treasure.  I've loved it since I was a dumb college freshman who knew nothing about art
column5: and I've visited probably about two dozen times since then.  In the last few years
column6: I've visited many art museums all over the U.S. and Europe
column7: and ours competes favorably with all of them.  In fact
column8: I would put it in the top three museums in my experience (the others are the Met in New York and the Kunsthistorisches in Vienna).
